[Quick Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=4816) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=811" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=601" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 147 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 97 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=49) (Level 10), [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=81) (Level 10), [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=240) (Level 10), [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=268) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=5212)

</column>

---

You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to Shield Block.
